name: The OIC Agency
description:
OIC is an Interactive and Brand Communications Agency.
We are an award-winning provider of top-quality consumer and B2C and B2B strategic brand marketing. With a reputation for agility, creativity, and clarity, our work is included in the Library of Congress and featured at the Cooper-Hewitt National Design Museum. 
We help our clients delight their customers. We expand what’s possible for people to accomplish on the technologies they use every day.
